video.title: Git & GitHub: Merging
video.description:
We're busy people who learn to code, then practice by building projects for nonprofits. Learn Full-stack JavaScript, build a portfolio, and get great references with our open source community.

Join our community at https://freecodecamp.com
Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/freecodecamp
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/freecodecamp
Follow Quincy on Quora: https://www.quora.com/Quincy-Larson

topLevelComment.author: Beautiful Arabic
topLevelComment.text: Sorry, what looks very obvious to you, isn't really obvious to most of viewers. I think everything would be much clearer if we can see examples, instead of hearing quickly about them. Good luck <3

topLevelComment.author: Y A S H_Y A D A V
topLevelComment.text: Damn she is charming. So many facial expressions , hard to keep up :-D

topLevelComment.author: Kurohana
topLevelComment.text:

Thanks for these lessons!
